verbs.description: The Iran nuclear deal [V: has] been the focus of hot debate after President Trump said he might not join European allies in re - certifying the agreement .
[ARG1: The Iran nuclear deal] has [V: been] [ARG2: the focus of hot debate] [ARGM-TMP: after President Trump said he might not join European allies in re - certifying the agreement] .
The Iran nuclear deal has been the focus of hot debate after [ARG0: President Trump] [V: said] [ARG1: he might not join European allies in re - certifying the agreement] .
The Iran nuclear deal has been the focus of hot debate after President Trump said he [V: might] not join European allies in re - certifying the agreement .

The Iran nuclear deal has been the focus of hot debate after President Trump said [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: might] [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: join] [ARG1: European allies] [ARGM-PRP: in re - certifying the agreement] .
The Iran nuclear deal has been the focus of hot debate after President Trump said [ARG0: he] might not join European allies in re - [V: certifying] [ARG1: the agreement] .
